title: The Duchess of Bloomsbury Street
description: Pub 2019-04-01 Nanhai Publishing Company No. 84 Charing Cross Street didn't make me rich. it just let me receive hundreds of letters and calls. which made me well received and resumed me. A long lost confidence and self-esteem. I have been looking forward to coming to London for a lifetime. I got off at 84 Charing Cross and went to the old Max and Cohen books...
author: Helene Hanff
